name: St. Elizabeth of the Trinity

locations.description: Carmelite nun in Dijon, France, known for her mystical writings on the Trinity

summary: Elizabeth of the Trinity was a French Carmelite nun and mystic who wrote extensively on the indwelling of the Trinity in the soul. Despite suffering from Addison's disease, she maintained a joyful spirit and deep contemplative prayer. Her spiritual writings, particularly on being a 'praise of glory' to God, have influenced many.
